Articles.Content:
I block the spell with Harry Potter

I get Agent Washington angry. I point to the next poster and say "Tucker did it!"

The reference impacts with my hard armor of obliviousness and is destroyed.

I destroy the next user emotionally by saying that they aren't worthy of an attack.

My emotions are not swayed with comments like that.

I find a x10 Beggar's Bazooka, and fully load it before firing. There are now 30 rockets flying in the general direction of the next poster.

I scatter the Sands of Time around myself. Time flows backwards, returning to the beginning of the battle.

On 02/02/2014 at 5:01 PM, Souper said:

I use a Sepratron Launcher on the next poster.

I use a steel plate to shield myself from it.

Grumpy sniper grandma attacks the next poster.

I distract Grumpy sniper Grandma with a small child

and unleash a herd of rabid moose at the next poster

I greet them politely, they get easy and pass to the nearest bar.

Meanwhile the next poster drinks a glass of tainted beer in the bar.

I said no to Alcohol and ruined your time where i drunk beer.

I Use the Vito and Joe to destroy next poster

Hyper edit for the win

 

 

i throw a cloud of thallium sulfate at the next poster

I evacuate the planet and your cloud doesn't kill me.

I then blow up the whole planet killing the next poster.
*watches the planet go by by from my mun top resort and casino.* straps the next poster to a lawn chair powered by sepratrons

It's actually a Martin-Baker, and I pull the eject handle.

 

The next poster is my RIO. They hit their head on the canopy as they eject.
Ducking the conopy and the jet crashes on the next poster

The jet is vaporized by Zap-Sats (Little spinning things that do damage with lasers)

I launch a X-Ray Laser attack at the next poster.

Unfortunately for you, the strength of the below beam of power deflects the attack.

Speaking of the beam of power...

Survive this. And not the game's strategy.
Beam bounces back at next poster
Turned wave  into nothing  The next attack to the next poster is a meteor

Watching a meteor which is crossing the sky.

The next poster gets a meteorite.

I sell it to the next poster. I get thousands of dollars.

The next poster realizes that it's not a meteorite.  Before they find out what it is, it blows up in their face, shrapnel everywhere.
I redirect the shrapnels at the next poster.
Still continues ricochetting...

Luckily for me, it is only a hologram. With a high powered laser sufficient to melt any material, be it mirrors or tungsten, as its base.

So I pick up the base and point the very dangerous laser at the next poster.
I see Ultimate Steve pickup the very heavy base and duck before he can point it at me.  I open a valve marked Dinitrogen Tetroxide and run as the cloud of toxic orange smoke engulfs the next poster.

Gas mask mate.

I remove your internet connection.

Edited October 25, 2016 by NSEP

I use data.

I break the Internet.
